statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 5 , 6 \, x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} - 9 , -4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 5 , 3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3 , -5 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} + 14 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
